But where Konami's other big restoration project, Bloober's Silent Hill 2 remake, is a creative dialogue with the original game, Delta seems consumed by faithfulness to Kojima's original design.

 
Read more
articles.title: Does Metal Gear Solid need a new Kojima? Konami have “many people” in mind, but it's "difficult"

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Hello reader who is also a reader, and welcome back to Booked For The Week - our regular Sunday chat with a selection of cool industry folks about books! As is customary, I must jam my new cat into every article. I’ve tried to offer her several books, but she’s failed to turn even a single page so far. What a big dumbo. The best dumbo. The sweetest, smartest dumbo in the world, yes she is. Ahem. This week, it’s Supermassive, Niantic, and Sensible Object narrative designer and Limit Break mentor, Anastasia Dukakis! Cheers Ana! Mind if we have a nose at your bookshelf?
Read more
articles.title: What's on your bookshelf?: Supermassive and Niantic narrative designer Anastasia Dukakis

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Sundays are for more cat. She’s flop and headbutt-level comfortable around me now, but she still seems a bit terrified of my house in general. I’m going to hang out with her a bunch and see if I can instill some sort of object permanence re: my presence in the home. Before that, let’s read this week’s best writing about games (and game related things!)
Read more
articles.title: The Sunday Papers

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Stranger Video is a website that wants access to your webcam. Grant it and it will show you a close-up of your own face, the background around you cropped out. Close your eyes to tell it you're ready, and open them again when you hear a chime. It'll now connect you to a stranger doing the same thing: first person to blink loses.

You can play it here.

 
Read more
articles.title: Let's have a staring contest

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Valve have their own rating system for measuring how games run on Steam Deck, but even following the guidance of whether something is "Playable" or "Verified", I've still run into games that simply do not work on the handheld device.

Enter Steam reviews. Reviews from players who primarily played on Steam Deck will now have a little Deck icon, which when moused over tells you the exact amount of time spent on the Deck.

 
Read more
articles.title: You can now filter Steam reviews to show those who "played mostly on Steam Deck"

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Tens of thousands of people have been playing Deadlock, a new multiplayer shooter from Valve, for the past several months, but in that time there's been no official announcement or acknowledgement of the game's existence by its creators. Until now. Valve have posted an extremely barebones Steam store page for Deadlock, describing it as a "multiplayer game in early development."

 
Read more
articles.title: Deadlock, Valve's new multiplayer shooter, now has a barebones Steam page

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Hello hello hello! This is Edwin chatting. I don't usually get to do these weekend features, but Ollie and James are busy working their magic (stripmining Black Myth: Wukong for guides and fleeing Gamescom), while Nic can't type complete words anymore without getting his hands eaten (see latest domestic update, below). I know that Ollie usually does a picture puzzle for you, but I am comparatively innocent in the ways of Photoshop and more importantly, very lazy - so lazy that I can't think of an elegant way to complete this paragraph, and will proceed immediately to stating: here's what we're all playing this weekend.
 
Read more
articles.title: What are we all playing this weekend?

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
If you like jumping on enveloping pixelly architecture while basking in an atmosphere of pathological sadness, set aside some time on 20th September, because that’s when Rubeki's first-person spelunker Lorn’s Lure launches on Steam. Ah, I've been waiting a while for this one. Catch a new trailer below.
 Read more
articles.title: Amazingly grim retro sci-fi android spelunker Lorn’s Lure finally has a release date

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Everything I know about the French Revolution has hitherto come from two literary works: Hilary Mantel's excellent doorstopper A Place Of Greater Safety, and Kate Beaton's webcomics. Neither Mantel nor Beaton mention mechs, which are a core feature of Studio Imugi's new "ideology driven" turn-based strategy game Bonaparte: A Mechanized Revolution. I, for one, feel like I've been grossly ill-informed. Kate, Hilary - I've been quoting you for years at parties and it seems like all this time, people have been silently judging me for my ignorance of the role giant clockwork soldiers played in the fall of the Bastille.
 Read more
articles.title: Turn-based strategy game Bonaparte wants to redo the French Revolution, but this time with mechs

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
"Age of Empires with dinosaurs" is, the developers of the Dinolords recently told me in a cramped Gamescom booth, a flattering description for their upcoming England vs. Vikingsaurus RTS. It’s also not a terribly accurate one. From what I saw of the game, Dinolords is more about the lords than the dinos, having as much in common with Diablo-style ARPGs as it does with classic strategy. And that’s a distinction which might just elevate it out of novelty status.
Read more
articles.title: T-Rexes aren’t the only twist that Dinolords puts on medieval strategy

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Take the ballroom scene from Disney's Beauty And The Beast, swap the wailing utensils for an army of chibi cats, endow Belle with low-key Doctor Manhattan-grade powers of matter transformation, and you're perhaps beginning to approximate the experience of Infinity Nikki - an open world dress-up adventure from Singapore-based Infold and former Legend of Zelda: Breath Of The Wild developer Kentaro Tominaga.
Trailered this week at Gamescom 2024, it's the fifth installment in the hitherto mobile-focussed Nikki series and it's seemingly going down a storm, with over 12 million pre-registrations so far (albeit, many of them motivated by the prospect of collectively unlocked in-game bonuses). It's also a free-to-play game, and I have the usual unanswered questions about currencies and gacha, but I'm willing to give it the benefit of the doubt for the minute, because I have not spent nearly enough of my life considering the tactical applications of ballgowns. Here's that trailer.
 
Read more
articles.title: Glamtime never ends in Infinity Nikki, the open world dress-up game from Zelda talent

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
A few months back, I enjoyed lurking a conversation on the RPS Discord about the proliferation of cyberpunk/steampunk/atompunk/what-have-you-punk variants and how most of them in fact lack the rebelliousness and counter-counter elements that punk actually entails. That discussion was back on my mind as I sat down to play Reignbreaker, a new action-roguelike from Studio Fizbin, at Gamescom 2024 – slightly wary of its self-described medievalpunk styling. However! Turns out you’re trying to kill the queen. Yep, that’s, uh, that’s pretty punk.
Read more
articles.title: Reignbreaker is an anti-establishment roguelike that’s clearly pro-Hades

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
I can guarantee you that a zombie survival game called God Save Birmingham wasn't on your "2024 Video Game Announcements" bingo card. It takes place in 14th century England, and tasks you with fending off the rampant zombie hordes of a populace who've succumbed to a mysterious case of reanimation. Perhaps the cause is that there's no Maccies or TK Maxx at the local Bull Ring yet.
Read more
articles.title: Here's an open world zombie survival game set in medieval.... Birmingham?

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
I’m still a little giddy over how much I enjoyed lucarne-lobbing puzzler Tactical Breach Wizards. So much so that I mentioned in my review how I’m well up for another run of its fifteen hour campaign. I’d already got a few missions into hard mode. There's no more starting mana points! It’s a real...pane.
Now, I might have to start again, even if going out of my way to grab the tapes added in its developer's commentary mode is going to be extra tricky. Ah, but will being able to chuck the recorders at my enemies for a point of knockback afterwards make up for it?
 
Read more
articles.title: Even Tactical Breach Wizards' developer commentary can be used to knock people out of windows

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Hledáte vhodný termín pro společnou událost? Nejen v tomto případě by vám mohl přijít vhod článek, který popisuje zkušenost s preferenčním hlasováním účastníků ve sdílené tabulce dokumentu Google Sheets s využitím Schulzeho metody.
articles.title: Preferenční hlasování ve sdílené tabulce Schulzeho metodou

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Tato taškařice, vhodná na Apríla, je původně starý text z roku 2001 ze sekce „Zasmáli jsme se“ Linuxových novin, jsem autorem, takže jej ještě copypastuju na blog, abych na něj ex post upozornil.
articles.title: Šokující tajemství unixových systémů: hyperuživatel odhalen

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Kopřiva)
articles.description: Podíváme se na nový útok umožňující klonovat tokeny YubiKey, nové trendy v sextortion útocích, nebo zprávu o útocích ruské APT skupiny, na jejíž přípravě participovaly i české zpravodajské služby.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: klonování hardwarových tokenů YubiKey

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Projekt FreeBSD bude brzy dostane investici od německého fondu Sovereign Tech Fund (STF) ve výši 686 400 eur. Vývojáři KDE vtěsnali několik dalších funkcí do chystaného prostředí Plasma 6.2.
articles.title: FreeBSD dostane peníze od německého STF, nové funkce pro Plasma 6.2

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Knihovna Cairo má po roce novou stabilní verzi, Intel Arc konečně s měřením otáček ventilátorů na Linuxu 6.12, Mesa 24.2.2 s podporou Intel Lunar Lake a Battlemage / Xe2, vývojová verze Wine 9.17.
articles.title: Dopad záplat na Zen5 se limitně blíží nule, Wine opravuje podporu čtvrt století starého QuickTime

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Tímto příspěvkem bych chtěl volně navázat na předchozí články zabývající se klasifikací obrázků do několika tříd. V těch dřívějších článcích se jednalo o rozpoznání zápalu plic na základě RTG snímků.
articles.title: Lokalizace infekce malárie: klasifikační model a heatmap

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Dnes vynecháme menší dílčí novinky v budoucím vydání jádra Linux 6.12, naopak se podíváme primárně na poslední práce, které na tomto poli odvádí Intel pro své nejnovější grafické jádro generace Xe2.
articles.title: Novinky pro Linux 6.12 s důrazem na Intel Lunar Lake a Battlemage

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Satrapa)
articles.description: K zobrazení textové informace je potřeba písmo. Jeho volba významně ovlivňuje čitelnost textu a má velký dopad na uživatelský zážitek. Pojďme se podívat, jaké máme v písmech možnosti, jak je využívat, co dělat a čemu se naopak vyhnout.
articles.title: Písma a jejich použití: od beden s odlitky ke stažení souborů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Ještě jednou se vrátíme k modelu pro lineární regresi. S ním jsme se již setkali, ovšem ve skutečnosti je i zdánlivě jednoduchý koncept lineární regrese realizován tak, že ho lze využít mnoha dalšími způsoby.
articles.title: Scikit-learn: jednoduchý a současně i univerzální model lineární regrese

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Ondřej Surý)
articles.description: Nová verze DNS serveru BIND 9.20.0 přináší významná vylepšení po dvou letech vývoje. Klíčové novinky zahrnují nové aplikační a databázové jádro, optimalizovanou podporu DNSSEC a vylepšenou kompresi DNS jmen.
articles.title: BIND 9.20: vylepšený výkon resolveru a nové databázové a aplikační jádro

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Server Phoronix dnes testoval dva 192jádrové ARM64 systémy. Jedním byl AmpereOne A192–32X (192 jader na 3,2 GHz) a druhým AWS Graviton4 (192 Neoverse V2 na 2,7 GHz).
articles.title: Nejrychlejší ARM64: AmpereOne proti AWS Graviton4

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Čip v Raspberry Pi Pico RP2040 má svůj Rust už dlouhou dobu. Existuje například projekt rp-rs a také embassy-rs s asynchronním frameworkem pro embedded zařízení Embassy. Vývojář Jonathan Pallant přidal do projektu rp-rs podporu pro Raspberry Pi Pico 2 s čipem RP2350.
articles.title: Rust na Raspberry Pi Pico 2

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Docker je dnes technologie, která proces vývoje, testování a provozování softwaru velmi zjednodušuje. Provozujte cokoliv a kdekoliv. Už nečekejte na nastavení svého serveru nebo na aktualizaci nějaké knihovny. Mějte prostředí jako součást vaší aplikace.
articles.title: Naučte se pracovat s Dockerem a kontejnery (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Vývojář KDE  Nate Graham na svém blogu před dvěma týdny napsal, že KDE bude jednou za rok zobrazovat žádost o finanční příspěvek. Bude to v prosinci a je jedno, jak tuto žádost uživatel zavře. Objeví se zase až za rok.
articles.title: KDE/Plasma bude jednou za rok zobrazovat žádost o finanční příspěvek

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Notebook Slimbook Plasma VI byl představen na konferenci KDE Akademy a už je podrobně popsán na webu kde.slimbook.es. Je vybaven procesorem AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS s integrovanou grafikou Radeon 780M, displejem s rozlišením 2560×1600, hliníkovým šasi a sloty na DDR5–5600 s podporou až 96 GB RAM.
articles.title: KDE Slimbook VI je poháněn procesorem AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Alejandro Colomar, který poslední čtyři roky spravoval linuxové manuálové stránky, oznámil, že bude muset tuto práci ukončit. Tuto užitečnou činnost totiž dělal ve svém volném čase a žádná firma jeho práci nesponzorovala. V současné době již nemohu tuto práci ekonomicky udržet. Dočasně a na dobu neurčitou tedy přestanu na tomto projektu pracovat, vysvětluje ve svém mailu.
articles.title: Údržba linuxových manuálových stránek byla pozastavena

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Tým vývojářů okolo webového serveru Nginx oznámil, že oficiální vývoj otevřeného kódu projektu Nginx se přesunul z Mercurialu na GitHub. Projekt tedy bude nyní přijímat příspěvky ve formě pull requestů.
articles.title: Nginx přesunul svůj vývoj na GitHub

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Minulý týden jsme tu měli projekt internetového rádia Yoradio s ESP32. Poté jsem byl upozorněn na projekt AM/FM rádia, také založeném na ESP32 a čipu TEF6686/TEF6687. Projekt založila skupina kolem FMDX.org. Dokáže přijímat FM OIRT a CCIR 65–108 MHz a také AM dlouhé, střední a krátké vlny 144 kHz – 27 MHz.
articles.title: Open source AM/FM rádio s ESP32

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description:
Server Phoronix testoval server s procesorem AmpereOne A192–32X 
(192 Arm64 jader na 3,2 GHz) na jádře 6.11 s výchozí stránkou 4 kB a 64 kB. Jako téměř všechny Arm64 procesory je výchozí stránka konfigurovatelná a může být 4, 16, nebo 64 kB. Přitom x86 má pouze 4 kB. Větší stránka znamená větší výkon, ale také o trochu větší spotřebu paměti. Google u Androidu chystá přechod z 4 kB na 16 kB a slibuje průměrně o 5–10 % lepší výkon a asi o 9 % větší spotřebu paměti.
articles.title: Test výkonu AmpereOne se stránkou 64 kB

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Výzkumníci z Virtuals Protocol vytvořili AI MarioVGG (Virtual Game Generation), která dokáže vytvořit video hru jen podle videa, v tomto případě Super Mario Bros.  Dataset s obrázky ze hry je dostupný na GitHubu. Obsahuje přes 700 tisíc obrázků z 280 úrovní hry. Přitom se rozlišují pouze příkazy „běž doprava“ a „běž doprava a skoč“.
articles.title: AI vytvořilo hru Super Mario jen podle videa

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: O podpoře GPU Intel Lunar Lake a Battlemage Xe2 v linuxovém jádře jsme tu dnes psali. Dostane se do jádra 6.12.
articles.title: Mesa 24.2.2 podporuje Intel Lunar Lake a Battlemage Xe2

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: HTTPS se stává běžným, většina webů už ho nasadila. Jak to ale udělat správně, opravdu bezpečně a hlavně bezbolestně? Na školení HTTPS pro správce serverů si ukážeme si nejnovější trendy, prakticky si vyzkoušíme vygenerování certifikátu a nasazení na web server.
articles.title: HTTPS pro správce serverů (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Jason Donenfeld, vývojář WireGuardu, již dva roky pracuje na getrandom() ve vDSO, aby bylo možné náhodná čísla v user-space generovat rychleji přímo v jádře. Pro architekturu x86_64 bylo getrandom() ve vDSO začleněno do jádro 6.11.
articles.title: Jádro 6.12 bude mít getrandom() ve vDSO pro Arm64 a LoongArch

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Intel se podělil o několik důležitých novinek týkajících se vyšetřování problému s nestabilitou Vmin Shift u desktopových procesorů Intel Core 13. a 14. generace, o které jsme psali už v srpnu. Výrobce potvrdil, že nová generace procesorů s kódovým označením Arrow Lake a Lunar Lake problémem netrpí.
articles.title: Intel vydal nový seznam procesorů, které nejsou ovlivněny nestabilitou „Vmin Shift“

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojářům operačního systému Redox OS napsaném v jazyce Rust se podařilo vyřešit výkonnostní úzké hrdlo, takže je systém mnohem výkonnější, když běží jako virtuální stroj. V některých syntetických benchmarcích dokonce dokáže běžet „o něco rychleji“ než Linux. Žádná konkrétní čísla ale zveřejněna nebyla.
articles.title: Redox zlepšil výkon ve virtuálním prostředí

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři uvolnili novou verzi virtualizačního nástroje QEMU označenou jako 9.1. Přináší řadu změn v mnoha oblastech, nejdůležitější je ale podpora nových procesorů Intel Icelake-Server-v7, SapphireRapids-v3 a SierraForest a podporu AMD SEV-SNP použitelnou s novými jádry s podporou pro AMD EPYC.
articles.title: Vyšlo QEMU 9.1 s podporou AMD SEV-SNP a akcelerací Intel IAA při migraci

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Mozilla má zájem o dekodér obrázků JPEG XL napsaný v jazyce Rust kvůli jeho paměťové bezpečnosti. Bobby Holley, technický šéf Firefoxu, vyjádřil svůj postoj k podpoře dekodéru obrázků JPEG XL pro Firefox napsaného v Rustu. Říká v něm, že vývojáři zvažují zařazení nového dekodéru napsaného v Rustu.
articles.title: Mozilla by chtěla dekodér pro JPEG XL napsaný v Rustu, vyvine jej zřejmě Google

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V repozitářích pro aktuální Debian je sice k dispozici více než 74 tisíc balíčků pro architekturu x86_64, ale ne všechny balíčky jsou dobře udržované a část z nich již dlouho nebyla udržována či aktualizována. Vývojáři Debianu nedávno začali diskutovat o tom, jak začít z archivu odstraňovat další z těchto dlouho neudržovaných balíčků.
articles.title: Vývojáři Debianu diskutují o odstranění neudržovaných balíčků

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Google oznámil, že zdrojový kód systému Android 15 byl uvolněn do projektu Android Open-Source Project (AOSP). Pro telefony Pixel by přitom systém byl měl být vydán během několika následujících týdnů. Ostatní výrobci na svá zařízení dostanou Android 15 v řádu měsíců. Nyní mohou na portaci začít také tvůrci alternativních ROM.
articles.title: Android 15 uvolněn do projektu Android Open-Source

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Pytelka)
articles.description: Tým věnující se projektu Bugzilla připravil po pěti letech novou stabilní verzi 5.2. Současně pokračuje vývoj budoucí verze 6 (projekt Harmony), společně byla vydána verze 5.9.1 - Developer Preview Release.
articles.title: Vyšla Bugzilla 5.2 a 5.91

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Otevřený firmware Coreboot v nové verzi 24.08 podporuje tři desítky dalších desek, kde mezi těmi uživatelsky běžně kupovanými najdeme ASRock Fatal1ty Z87 Professional, Z87E-ITX, Z87M OC Formula, Z97E-ITX/ac či Gigabyte GA-H61M-S2P-R3 a notebook HP EliteBook 8560w. Celkově více než 900 patchů od více než 130 vývojářů stojí i za opravou řady chyb.
articles.title: Coreboot 24.08 přidává 31 základních desek a počáteční podporu Intel Panther Lake

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Příslušný Wayland protokol xx-color-management-v4 pro správu barev (color management) je již součástí kandidáta na vydání ostré verze kompozitoru GNOME Mutter 47. Shrnuje řadu pull requestů implementujích podporu pro barevné prostory sRGB a PQ+Bt.2020 (Perceptual Quantize).
articles.title: GNOME Mutter 47 přinese správu barev na Waylandu a opravu EGLDevice pro starší GeForce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Zatímco s JPEG XL se Google moc nezabývá, AVIF má u něj stále lépe a lépe ustláno. Po jinak běžně Googlem podporovaném formátu WebP, odvozeném od videa WebM, tedy komprese VP8/VP9, nyní do vyhledávání Googlu nyní přibývá podpora obrázků ve formátu AVIF.
articles.title: Google přidává podporu AVIF do vyhledávání

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Byla objevena zranitelnost v kryptografické knihovně společnosti Infineon, která se používá v zařízeních YubiKey řady 5 a Security Key Series s firmwarem před verzí 5.7.0 a YubiHSM 2 s firmwarem před verzí 2.4.0. Společnost Yubico potvrdila dopad na její bezpečnostní tokeny, závažnost ohodnotila stupněm střední.
articles.title: Chyba v knihovně Infineon ohrožuje soukromé klíče z tokenů YubiKey a dalších zařízení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: VPN umožňuje bezpečně propojit různá zařízení pomocí šifrovaných tunelů. Umožňuje také zapojit uživatele do vnitřní sítě přes zabezpečený přístupový bod. Na školení si prakticky ukážeme, jak to celé nastavit a zprovoznit pomocí nejnovějšího protokolu WireGuard.
articles.title: WireGuard: nasazujeme VPN rychle a jednoduše (školení)

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Patří datová centra do vesmíru? Acer představuje nové notebooky Swift Copilot+ s procesory Intel Core Ultra (Series 2). Kam míří automatizace sítí. Školy a univerzity stále více doplácejí na zanedbávání zranitelností. Kvantové počítače spolupracují s magnony.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Kvantové počítače spolupracují s magnony

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 36/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Black Hole Moon: Máme tu další nápad, jak by mimozemské civilizace mohly čerpat energii z černých děr. Odchylky v interakcích částic mají ukazovat na existenci nových bosonů. Předpovídají nový detekovatelný zdroj gravitačních vln z kolabujících hvězd.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Informatici z Matfyzu získali US patent na vícezdrojový překlad

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ness Czech spouští nový inovační datový hub pro střední a východní Evropu. Fortinet rozšiřuje bezpečnostní platformu pro ochranu kyberneticko-fyzikálních systémů. Umělá inteligence předvídá zločin a odhalí i ukrytou zbraň. Budoucnost podnikové umělé inteligence není o větším množství dat. Red Hat na podporu svých implementačních partnerů rozšířil partnerský program.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Budoucnost podnikové umělé inteligence není o větším množství dat

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Nový objev ve světě polovodičů: Vědci potvrdili existenci další modifikace uhlíku. Black Hole Moon: Máme tu další nápad, jak by mimozemské civilizace mohly čerpat energii z černých děr. Vodu v hlubinách Marsu nepřeceňovat.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Technosignatury se možná dají snadno přehlédnout

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Slevy v akci Back to School pokračují. Jedna ze stránek, která poskytuje nejlepší nabídku a je také spolehlivá, je Goodoffer24.com. Zde jsou ceny které se vymykají, zvláště pro operační systém Microsoft, a to jak pro současnou verzi, tak předchozí, a také jak pro verze Pro či Home. A dále také, s exkluzivním kódem, můžete získat další 30% slevu, abyste se mohli těšit z doživotních licencí. Nebo jinak, platíte jen jednou a můžete zapomenout na problémy.
articles.title: Slevy na Goodoffer24 Back to School až 91 %: Windows 11 jen za €20, Office za €24!

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 35/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Acronis představuje novou verzi Acronis True Image na českém trhu. Prodej podnikového softwaru vzrostl v roce 2023 o 12 %. Vědci vyvinuli metodu detekce jednoatomových defektů v polovodičích. Každá pátá firma zasažena útoky na dodavatelský řetězec hardwaru. České firmy platí po útoků ransomwarem výkupné i 6 milionů Kč.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Prodej podnikového softwaru vzrostl v roce 2023 o 12 %

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Navrhují hledat temnou hmotu v neutronových hvězdách. Nová analýza dat z Webbova dalekohledu ukazuje, že s Hubbleovou konstantou nemusí být problém.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Nitridy uhlíku mohou konkurovat diamantu

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 34/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: V letních měsících byly vydány aktualizace openSUSE Leap a SUSE, FreeBSD, Debianu, na testování zabezpečení zaměřených distribucí Kali a Parrot, dále např. IPFire, EasyOS, Tails či EndeavourOS.
articles.title: Distribuční novinky 23-26/2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Apple představil (YouTube) telefony iPhone 16 Pro a iPhone 16, hodinky Watch Series 10 a Watch Ultra 2 a sluchátka AirPods 4, AirPods Pro 2 a AirPods Max.
articles.title: iPhone 16 Pro, iPhone 16, Watch Series 10, Watch Ultra 2, AirPods 4, AirPods Pro 2 a AirPods Max

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána verze 0.9.0 operačního systému Redox OS (Wikipedie). Jedná se o mikrokernelový unixový operační systém naprogramovaný v programovacím jazyce Rust. Zdrojové kódy jsou k dispozici na GitLabu pod licencí MIT. Z novinek lze vypíchnout aplikace Files, Editor a Terminal z desktopového prostředí COSMIC, RustPython nebo webový server Simple HTTP Server.
articles.title: Redox OS 0.9.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Dnes ve 23:59 končí hlasování o přednáškách na konferenci LinuxDays 2024, která proběhne o víkendu 12. a 13. října v Praze.
articles.title: Dnes končí hlasování o přednáškách na LinuxDays 2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Vývojáři KDE ve spolupráci se společností Slimbook oznámili 16palcový notebook KDE Slimbook VI s předinstalovaným KDE Neon s Plasmou 6. Uvnitř se nachází procesor AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS s integrovanou grafickou kartou Radeon 780M.
articles.title: KDE Slimbook VI

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Ve Würzburgu dnes začala konference vývojářů a uživatelů desktopového prostředí KDE Akademy 2024. Sledovat lze také online (YouTube, Mastodon, 𝕏, …)
articles.title: Akademy 2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová major verze 14 svobodného systému pro řízení přístupu k síti (NAC) PacketFence (Wikipedie). Přehled novinek v oznámení o vydání. Pro uživatele předchozích verzí jsou k dispozici poznámky k aktualizaci.
articles.title: PacketFence 14

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Jak nahrávat zvuk z webového prohlížeče na Linuxu s PipeWire pomocí Nahrávání zvuku (Sound Recorder) a Helvum případně qpwgraph, článek na webu Libre Arts.
articles.title: Jak nahrávat zvuk z webového prohlížeče na Linuxu

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Vývoj webového serveru a reverzní proxy nginx byl přesunut z Mercurial na GitHub.
articles.title: Vývoj nginx přesunut na GitHub

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Open source platforma Home Assistant (Demo, GitHub, Wikipedie) pro monitorování a řízení inteligentní domácnosti byla vydána ve verzi 2024.9.
articles.title: Home Assistant 2024.9

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: České bezpečnostní instituce, jmenovitě Vojenské zpravodajství (VZ) a Bezpečnostní informační služba (BIS), ve spolupráci s americkou Agenturou pro kybernetickou a infrastrukturní bezpečnost (CISA), Federálním úřadem pro vyšetřování (FBI), Národní bezpečností agenturou (NSA) a dalšími mezinárodními partnery ze Spojeného království, Austrálie, Kanady, Německa, Nizozemska, Estonska, Ukrajiny a Lotyšska vydaly upozornění (en, pdf), jež se týká kybernetických operací aktéra spojeného s ruskou Hlavní správou rozvědky (GRU), konkrétně 161. Specializovaného školicího střediska (Jednotka 29155). Jednotka 29155 je přinejmenším od roku 2020 zodpovědná za operace v počítačových sítích proti globálním cílům za účelem špionáže, sabotáže a poškození reputace.
articles.title: Upozornění na škodlivé aktivity ruského státního aktéra útočícího na kritickou infrastrukturu

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Excitement is building that the real-time kernel "PREEMPT_RT" support might finally be ready for the mainline kernel as soon as the upcoming Linux 6.12 merge window. It will be interesting to see if that long-awaited day finally comes this month but recently noted patches have now been queued into tip/tip.git's "sched/rt" branch ahead of the Linux 6.12 merge window...
articles.title: Latest "sched/rt" Commits Point To PREEMPT_RT Potentially Being Ready For Linux 6.12

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: With the Supermicro ARS-211M-NR R13SPD server that's in the lab for a few weeks for reviewing the AmpereOne A192-32X and delivering the first independent benchmarks of the AmpereOne 192-core AArch64 server processor, the AmpereOne benchmarks to date have been comparing to other Intel Xeon and AMD EPYC server platforms. But if looking up to the cloud is the closest AArch64 server competition to AmpereOne there is: Amazon's Graviton4. In today's article ia showdown looking at how AmpereOne and AWS Graviton4 compete at 192 cores for ARM 64-bit server performance.
articles.title: AWS Graviton4 vs. AmpereOne 192-Core Benchmarks For Leading AArch64 Server Performance

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Redox OS 0.9 has been released today as a big update to this from-scratch Rust-written open-source operating system...
articles.title: Redox OS 0.9 Brings COSMIC Apps, Better Performance & Improved Linux App Compatibility

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Earlier this summer KDE began soliciting ideas for what their goals should be over the next 2~3 years. This weekend at their annual Akademy KDE developer conference their next round of goals were solidified...
articles.title: KDE Plans To Enhance Application Development Experience, Recruit More Contributors

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While Intel Lunar Lake is only beginning to ship later this month, Intel Linux engineers have already begun work on enabling its successor: Panther Lake. With the upcoming Linux 6.12 kernel cycle will be more early enablement work on Intel Panther Lake, presumably what will be the Core Ultra 300 series...
articles.title: Intel Panther Lake HDMI Audio Support Coming With Linux 6.12

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Miracle-WM 0.3.5 was released this weekend as the newest step forward for this Mir-based window manager / Wayland compositor developed by a Canonical engineer. Miracle-WM continues being polished ahead of the upcoming Fedora Miracle Spin debuting as part of Fedora 41...
articles.title: Mir-based Miracle-WM Adds Optional Systemd Integration

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: OpenJPH v0.16 has been released as the newest version of this open-source implementation of High-Throughput JPEG2000 (HTJK), also known as JPH / JPEG2000 Part 15. With this new release comes faster performance thanks to making use of Advanced Vector Extensions 2 (AVX2) to complement its existing AVX-512 code...
articles.title: OpenJPH v0.16 Now Using AVX2 For Faster HTJ2K/JPEG2000

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Hyprland 0.43 is out as the newest version of this independent, very customizable Wayland compositor focused on providing a dynamic tiling experience...
articles.title: Hyprland 0.43 Wayland Compositor Releases, Raises Build Requirements To C++26

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The GNOME 47 release candidate was announced a short time ago in preparing for the stable GNOME 47 stable desktop coming up...
articles.title: GNOME 47 Release Candidate Brings Last Minute Changes

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following recent international travels, Linus Torvalds is back to his usual late Sunday Linux kernel release regiment. Linux 6.11-rc7 was released a few minutes ago as Linux 6.11 approaches the finish line...
articles.title: Linux 6.11-rc7 Released: Linux 6.11 Stable Possibly Next Sunday

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While Windows gamers seem mixed over the AMD Ryzen 9000 series processors, for creator, scientific / HPC, code development, and many other technical computing areas I remain very impressed by the Ryzen 9000 (Zen 5) series desktop processors more than one month into constant testing with these Granite Ridge chips. One of the areas I hadn't explored until now but made me curious given the mixed messaging around gaming was how well workstation graphics workloads were performing with the new processors. For this brief weekend article is a look at the workstation graphics performance between the Ryzen 9 9950X and former Ryzen 9 7950X/7950X3D processors.
articles.title: AMD Ryzen 9 9950X vs. Ryzen 9 7950X/7950X3D For Workstation Graphics

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The work written about earlier this year on New Intel Linux Patches Continue Working To Improve Hybrid CPU Task Placement looks like it will be merged for the upcoming Linux 6.12 cycle as the patches have now been queued into the power management subsystem's "-next" branch. This latest Intel Core hybrid handling work is particularly focused on hybrid P/E-core processors without SMT / Hyper Threading, such as found with the upcoming Core Ultra 200V "Lunar Lake" processors...
articles.title: Linux 6.12 To Enhance The Hybrid P/E Core Experience On Intel Lunar Lake

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: OpenBMC as the Linux Foundation project backed by vendors like Intel / Microsoft / Google / Meta for an open-source BMC firmware stack continues to be a growing success. This alternative to long-used proprietary BMC software stacks continues to grow in popularity with AMD now using it on their reference motherboards and Supermicro being another notable user with some of their server platforms. Not entirely new but been meaning to write about it and NVIDIA talked more openly about it this week: NVIDIA is also a big supporter and user of OpenBMC for their high-end AI/HPC servers and BlueField DPU hardware...
articles.title: Even NVIDIA Has Jumped Big On The Open-Source OpenBMC Train

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While RISC-V processors don't need to worry about Meltdown and Spectre or have any other severe CPU vulnerabilities at the moment, with the upcoming Linux 6.12 kernel the RISC-V code is set to enable the generic CPU vulnerabilities support...
articles.title: RISC-V Enabling Generic CPU Vulnerabilities Reporting

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Merged three years ago in Linux 5.12 was IDMAPPED mounts for new use-cases from containers to systemd-homed. IDMAPPED mounts allow for different mounts to expose the same file or directory with different ownership such as for sharing files between multiple users or multiple systems. With time all of the major Linux file-systems have seen support added for IDMAPPED mounts while for Linux 6.12 support is on the way for FUSE file-systems...
articles.title: FUSE Adding IDMAPPED Mounts Support In Linux 6.12

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While KDE developers this weekend are busy attending Akademy 2024 as their annual developer conference taking place in Würzburg, Germany, prior to that there were a few last minute features merged for the upcoming Plasma 6.2 desktop...
articles.title: KDE Squeezes A Few More Features Into The Plasma 6.2 Desktop

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Building off yesterday's release of Wine 9.17 with its latest improvements for enjoying Windows games/apps on Linux, Hangover 9.17 is now out. Hangover as a reminder is the Wine-based effort for running Windows x86 applications under ARM64 Linux by leveraging Wine with emulators like QEMU, FEX, and Box64 for the cross CPU architecture handling...
articles.title: Hangover 9.17 Ships With Wine Wayland Support, Ubuntu 24.10 Packages

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While C tends to be the go-to launguage for microcontrollers, Raspberry Pi is promoting the prospects of using Rust on their RP2350 microcontroller...
articles.title: Raspberry Pi Showcases Rust On The RP2350 Microcontroller

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The Slimbook crew shared on Twitter/X that they are showing off the new Slimbook 6 (Slimbook VI) laptop this weekend during the KDE Akademy conference taking place in the wonderful Würzburg, Germany. This new Slimbook laptop features an AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS SoC and of course uses the KDE Plasma 6 desktop environment out-of-the-box...
articles.title: Slimbook KDE Plasma VI Laptop Announced - Powered By AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Ahead of GNOME 47's imminent release, Matthias Clasen has released GTK 4.16 as the newest exciting update to this toolkit powering GNOME software. Notable with GTK 4.16 is the GSK renderer defaulting to its Vulkan back-end when running on Wayland...
articles.title: GTK 4.16 Released With Vulkan GSK Renderer By Default On Wayland

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: We are just a week or two out from the start of the Linux 6.12 merge window and AMD has submitted a final round of feature updates to DRM-Next of kernel graphics driver changes they want to round out AMDGPU/AMDKFD for this next cycle...
articles.title: AMD Enables Per-Queue Resets For Newer GPUs & Other Linux 6.12 AMDGPU Changes

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Cairo 1.18.2 released this week nearly one year after Cairo 1.18's debut for this cross-platform 2D vector graphics library -- in turn that was the project's first stable release in five years. Cairo is important for the GTK toolkit, Mozilla's Gecko engine, and dozens of other software projects. With Cairo 1.18.2 there are many fixes that have accumulated over the past year for bettering this graphics library...
articles.title: Cairo 1.18.2 Collects A Year's Worth Of Fixes

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Wine 9.17 is out today as quite an exciting update for this open-source software that allows Windows games and applications to run on Linux systems and other platforms...
articles.title: Wine 9.17 Released With Better ARM64 CPU Detection, HiDPI Window Surface Scaling

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Intel has submitted more kernel graphics driver changes for the upcoming Linux 6.12 cycle. Following the pull requests to DRM-Next last week to enable Lunar Lake Xe2 graphics and Battlemage by default, some more lingering feature patches were merged today. Most exciting with this last round of patches before Linux 6.12? Intel graphics card fan speed reporting is finally wired up for their Linux driver...

For those wondering about the mitigation costs or if it's worthwhile running Zen 5 with the "mitigations=off" insane mode, here are some benchmarks.

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
If you’re planning on refining a melee build in Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2, you may see that there are three defense types such as block, balance, and fencing. 


The former two are straightforward, so what is fencing? We’ll break this down below and compare it between the other two types.


What is fencing in Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2?


Fencing is a defense type on melee weapons that is primarily focused on performing parries. This is one of the stronger options if you’re trying to maintain your health and armor upkeep. 


It requires better timing when you see a blue enemy circle indicating they’re about to attack. In other cases, you can still parry attacks that don’t appear with the indicator as long as it isn’t the lethal red one.


Fencing compared to block and balance


Fencing is a high-risk, high-reward playstyle compared to the other two defense types. Your timing has to be good. Otherwise, you’ll suffer a lot of damage and possibly go down, especially with higher difficulties.


With balance, you can play defensively or use parrying. This is if you want to still parry but also block if you get overrun or you’re still practicing on your timing.


Lastly, the block defense type lives up to its name. It focuses on blocking attacks and having massive damage reduction over performing reversals. If your timing is bad or you are going to rely on other players to take out big, this is going to be more up your alley.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Is fencing the best defense type?


Technically, this would be the best type, but it’s dependent on your skill. Performing a parry means that you’ll be performing finisher attacks more often on enemies. 


During these finisher animations on enemies, you’re completely invulnerable. So, performing these back-to-back will make you even more tanky and an excellent bait for other players to take out high-priority targets like Majoris and Extremis-level enemies.

The post What is fencing in Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: What is fencing in Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2?

articles.description:
After six years of Cursed Spirits slaying, the Jujutsu Kaisen manga is almost on its way out with its final arc. It'll finally determine the fate of the beloved Jujutsu Sorcerors, an ensemble that has endured many trials and tribulations since the start. We'll show you when to expect Jujutsu Kaisen's manga ending to prepare you for its conclusion.


Jujutsu Kaisen manga end date


JJK creator Gege Akutami first announced the manga's ending, marking its conclusion after a select few chapters. The saga's official page also confirmed a more precise date: Sept. 30, 2024. That means Chapter 271 will be the last of the series, tying into the Shinjuku Showdown arc.


You can look forward to the remaining chapters, which will debut every Sunday until the end of September. They can typically be read for free on Viz Media or Manga Plus, featuring other recent storylines.


Image via MAPPA


As for what we can expect from Jujutsu Kaisen's manga ending, it could go down in plenty of ways. I won't go into too much about what's been happening in the manga to avoid any spoilers, but I will say that it does correlate with the main objective of bringing the infamous Sukuna down. Whatever the case may be for the manga, the conclusion will undoubtedly explain what happens to the Jujutsu Sorcerers or even include one more battle just for kicks.


Fortunately, the JJK adventures have yet to conclude with the promise of new episodes. While not much is known about Season 3, we can remain hopeful for more details in the coming months. There's still a lot to dig into with the anime's current place in the timeline, which may cover the entirety of its following season. Given the success of Jujutsu Kaisen 0, there's a good chance we might see the show's ending as a film instead. We'll possibly get more information about this once the manga concludes. 

The post When will the Jujutsu Kaisen manga end? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: When will the Jujutsu Kaisen manga end?

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
Atlus' next big RPG Metaphor: ReFantazio looks to be a visual treat from its imaginative fantasy locations to its illustrious menu UI. Hopefully, you meet the Metaphor: ReFantazio PC system requirements to make this game look glorious on your monitor or TV.


Metaphor: ReFantazio PC system requirements - minimum specs


To run Metaphor: Fantazio at 720p resolution with 30 frames per second (FPS), you'll need the following specs, according to the game's Steam listing:



OS: Windows 10


Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-6300


Memory: 6 GB RAM


Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, 4GB or AMD Radeon R7 360, 4GB or Intel Arc A310, 4GB


DirectX: Version 11


Storage: 93 GB available space



The game's developer Atlus and the publisher Sega also say that you require a CPU with AVX support. You can check if your Intel processor has this functionality by looking up the Instruction Set Extensions from the CPU Technologies tab in the Intel Processor Identification Utility app. Most modern computers should have AVX support.


Image via Atlus


Metaphor: ReFantazio is fairly beefy with 93GB of storage being taken. However, it's smaller than other RPGs like Starfield or Final Fantasy XVI.


Recommended specs for Metaphor: ReFantazio


If you want this gorgeous Atlus game to run with 1080p resolution at 60 FPS, you'll need the following:



OS: Windows 10


Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 or Ryzen 5 2600


Memory: 8 GB RAM


Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 480, 4GB or Intel Arc A380, 6GB


DirectX: Version 11


Storage: 93 GB available space



You'll want to at least match the recommended specs for this game because our preview said "It might be one of the most stylish games [..] in some time."

The post Metaphor: ReFantazio PC system requirements – minimum and recommended appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Metaphor: ReFantazio PC system requirements – minimum and recommended

If you’re lucky, it’s possible to come across Edda’s ghost in any of the three starting city states (Limsa Lominsa, Gridania, or Ul’dah). And I do mean very lucky, because she has a less than 1% chance to spawn in her ghostly form. She’ll stick around…

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
As spotted by Nintendo Wire, Sanei has a new Super Mario Wonder plush, this one based on those incessant talking flowers. Wait, do those things have names? Apparently, they’re just “Talking Flower.”


The announcement came in the form of a single Tweet, so there aren’t too many details on it. I don’t know what you’d want to know. They talk. It would be weird if they didn’t. I also don’t know why you’d want it to. Some people played through Super Mario Wonder without muting those awful things. Normally, I’d assume that this is because they didn’t know they could be turned off, but some people supposedly like them. I have hated them since the first trailer.




Ugh, they sound worse in Japanese. “Ganbare!” it shrieks upon the first squeeze. “Kimi no bouken wo…” Why? What was the point of these things? They make me want to salt the earth. “Waaaaandaaaaaa!” it screams, as though it cries in anguish at the falling heavens in some dramatic movie.


The quality of the plush at least looks pretty good. I want to say that some of the stuffies from the Mario series I have around my apartment were made by Sanei. Just checked; they are. I have a 1-up mushroom that has lasted me since college, so that’s a good sign. It’s important to note that the Talking Mushroom also has a cavity in its face, which you could use to put your… popcorn in. I don’t know.


The Talking Mushroom is out in November in Japan.

The post Those horrid talking flowers from Super Mario Wonder are being immortalized in plush form appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Those horrid talking flowers from Super Mario Wonder are being immortalized in plush form

articles.author: Christian Markle
articles.description:
The Blue Exorcist manga will be taking a short one-month break in October, as announced by manga author Kazue Kato. The manga will return in the December issue of Shueisha's Jump SQ. magazine, which is set to release on November 4. 




According to Anime News Network, Kato shared that her hiatus is due to health reasons. She revealed that she was diagnosed with a certain illness in March. She also continuously worked on the manga while receiving treatment and undergoing hospital visits. Recently, however, she underwent an operation. 


Even though the operation is successful and she has already been released from the hospital, the postoperative recovery process will require more time, prompting the break. Kato does not want to disclose the specifics of her illness at the moment, but she does reassure fans that it is not life-threatening.


Blue Exorcist tells the story of Rin Okumura, a son of Satan. Secretly raised by Father Fujimoto, a renowned exorcist, Rin’s life takes a dramatic turn when he uncovers the truth about his demonic lineage. Determined to defeat Satan, Rin enrolls in True Cross Academy, where he begins training to become an exorcist.


For readers eager to follow the story, the manga is available digitally on VIZ Media and MANGA Plus. Furthermore, the anime's latest season, Blue Exorcist: Beyond the Snow Saga, will start on October 5. The previous seasons are also available for streaming on Crunchyroll and Netflix, in certain regions.

The post The Blue Exorcist manga is taking a one-month hiatus appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: The Blue Exorcist manga is taking a one-month hiatus

articles.author: Shawn Robinson
articles.description:
If you're a big fan of Deadlock, there's a good chance you'll be playing many matches. You'll want to try out different characters, or practice your skills with others, so you'll be racking up many matches. 


If you want to check your stats over time, you might want to see your history. Here's how to see your match history in Deadlock.


How to see all your matches in Deadlock


Image via Destructoid.


To see your match history in Deadlock, you'll first want to head to the main menu. This can be done without it currently being active server times. Once there, click on View Profile in the top right of the screen. This will display a screen showing your playtime on all heroes, your individual stats with each, and most importantly, your match history.


Image via Destructoid.


Here, you can see your final results for the last nine matches you've played. Clicking on any of these nine matches will pull up a stats page showing individual stats for each player. You can also download a full replay of the previous match to review it and see where you went wrong. Seeing as I had an 0/11 game on Dynamo last night, that might not be too bad of an idea for me.


If you want to see your stats for games earlier than those nine matches, head back to your profile screen. This time, click on View All Match History in the top right, and you'll get a full list of your stats for every single match you've ever played. While you can see the stats from every single match, you can only view replays for games up to three weeks ago. All other matches will read as Replay Expired.

The post How to see your match history in Deadlock appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to see your match history in Deadlock

articles.author: Shawn Robinson
articles.description:
With each week of content in Destiny 2, a new Nightfall Strike rolls around. This is a more difficult version of a particular strike, bringing with it a specific weapon reward for you to farm. While it can only drop as a potential reward from lower difficulties, Grandmaster Nightfalls give a guaranteed Adept version of the weapon. 


On occasion, the weapon of the week is a particularly good sniper. Here's the god roll for the Uzume RR4 sniper rifle in Destiny 2, including perks and attachments.


The best perks and attachments for the Uzume RR4 in Destiny 2


Image via Destructoid.


The Uzume RR4 sports the Adaptive Frame archetype, giving the sniper better stats all around within any notable downsides. While this can be seen as boring since it doesn't do anything particularly exciting, it does open us up to picking perks that make the gun better in general, instead of improving a specific aspect of it. With that freedom in mind, the following setup should work quite nicely:



Barrel: Arrowhead Brake


Magazine: Tactical Mag


Perk 1: Fourth Time's the Charm


Perk 2: Vorpal Weapon



Arrowhead Brake is always a great barrel for snipers, granting better handling speed and reduced recoil. Tactical Mag is also just a great Magazine, since it gives reload speed, magazine size, and stability. Who doesn't want that on a sniper? 


Fourth Time's the Charm is like a budget version of the Whisper of the Worm, granting two shots to your magazine when hitting four precision shots in quick succession. Extra free ammo is just free damage. Finally, we have Vorpal Weapon, which helps make the Uzume do better damage against bosses. It won't beat your heavy weapon, but it'll give it a run for its money.

The post Destiny 2 Uzume RR4 god roll – Best perks and attachments appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Destiny 2 Uzume RR4 god roll – Best perks and attachments

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Riot revealed today that popular auto battler Teamfight Tactics will receive its second every set revival with Teamfight Tactics Revival: Dawn of Heroes, a limited game mode that refreshes and modernizes the set from three years ago. The revival version of the Reckoning: Dawn of Heroes set will feature an all-new progression system as well. Teamfight Tactics Revival: Dawn of Heroes goes live on September 25, 2024.




This is just the second set revival Riot has done for Teamfight Tactics, with the Set 3.5 Revival: Galaxies launching earlier this year. The set revival is a temporary game mode in which Teamfight Tactics champions and traits from the Reckoning: Dawn of Heroes set from 2021 are revamped to fit with today's version of TFT.


Also coming with this new set revival is a new ladder progression system, where players can unlock new ranks and rewards based on how they play the new TFT Revival game mode. Also, even though augments didn't exist back when Reckoning: Dawn of Heroes released—they are now a staple part of TFT gameplay—new augments have been created to specifically work with the set revival. New augments include The Monstrous Chopper, an Abomination trait-focused augment where the Monstrosity from the trait equips an ax to do additional cleave damage, as well as Death Approaches, which allows Thresh to hook himself to the farthest enemy and do additional damage on his next attack.


Players interested in checking out the Teamfight Tactics Revival: Dawn of Heroes limited-time game mode will be able to do so on both PC and mobile when TFTPatch 14.19 drops on September 25, 2024. The limited-time set will last through patch 14.21 which releases on November 4, 2024.

The post Teamfight Tactics second set revival is Dawn of Heroes, out later this month appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Teamfight Tactics second set revival is Dawn of Heroes, out later this month

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Jonathan Joestar introduces you to many of Jojo's Bizarre Adventure characters, from Robert E.O. Speedwagon to William Zeppeli. You'll have to conquer a few quests with them, involving some classic object-finding tasks. We're here to help you through the main quest line by showing you how to find Speedwagon's hat in World of Stands.


World of Stands Speedwagon's Hat location


Once you complete enough of the main quests in London, you'll meet Robert E.O. Speedwagon during the Time for Me to Fly mission. He'll enlist you on the quest to find his hat, which will be on top of one of the London buildings. First, look for the Gold Medal Beans structure in front of Joestar Estate.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Go toward the side of the building and climb up the ladder to reach the rooftop. There will be a few Speedwagon thugs here, but you can avoid them to focus on the mission.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Turn left and cross the wooden board to reach the next rooftop. Here, you'll find the elusive Speedwagon's hat for the World of Stands quest. Return to Robert, who should be underneath the same building where you found the hat. As a token of his gratitude, he'll reward you with 200 gold and 270 XP.


Screenshot by Destructoid


With the successful retrieval of Speedwagon's hat, you'll unlock the character's next quest, Can't Fight This Feeling. This mission is a crucial part of the main quest line, and by defeating three Speedwagon gang members, you'll earn more gold and XP. They'll be lingering around London, including near the hat location, so they shouldn't be too challenging to find. Utilize your Stand companion for quick takedowns, progressing you further in World of Stands.

The post Where to find Speedwagon’s Hat in World of Stands appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Where to find Speedwagon’s Hat in World of Stands

articles.author: Cameron Woolsey
articles.description:
Despite its status as a spin-off, Mario Party has become a well-established franchise of its own over the course of many years. Since 1998, the series has delighted and, often, enraged many fans. Super Mario Party Jamboree is next in line, bringing new ways to play and yell.


To be fair, most of the venting is due to the series of party games being surprisingly competitive, despite its delightfully spirited aesthetic. I've often joked that if you're looking to ruin friendships, few things work better than discussing religion, politics, or playing Mario Party. The games are a lot of fun for large gatherings, featuring exciting minigames to compete in as one of many dozens of Mario characters.


Image via Nintendo


Party up in here


There are more than 20 Mario Party games across an assor…
articles.title: Hands-on: Super Mario Party Jamboree sparks fresh excitement (and a bit of road rage) with its new Koopathlon mode

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
Just like last few games, NBA 2K25 has an established list of contact dunk requirements that you'll have to stick with before you can slam on top of your opponent.


Contact dunk requirements are important for most, and especially if you're running a MyCareer build focused on the C/PF positions. To unlock the best animations for your specific build, you'll need to meet the requirements. Let's take a look at how the requirements look this year for all available builds. 


Like in NBA 2K24, contact dunks can be split into four categories, and we will take a look at all their requirements. 


NBA 2K25 Two Foot Moving contact dunk requirements


Almost identical settings as last year, the emphasis on vertical has been slightly lowered. 


Type
Requirements




Elite
Driving Dunk 96+, Vertical 82+


Pro
Driving Dunk 87+, Vertical 75+


Small
Driving Dunk 86+, Vertical 75+, Height under 6'5






NBA 2K25 One Foot Moving contact dunk


Type
Requirements




Elite
Driving Dunk 99+, Vertical 80+


Pro
Driving Dunk 89+, Vertical 78+


Small
Driving Dunk 93+, Vertical 80+, Height under 6'5






NBA 2K25 Standing contact dunk


This particular type is unavailable for small builds due to the height requirements. 


Type
Requirements




Elite Standing Bigs
Standing Dunk 90+, Vertical 70+, Height at least 6'10


Pro Standing Bigs
Standing Dunk 80+, Vertical 60+, Height at least 6'10






NBA 2K25 Alley-Oops contact dunk


The Alley-Oops contact dunk has the largest available options. 


Type
Requirements




Elite
Driving Dunk 92+, Vertical 80+


Pro
Driving Dunk 84+, Vertical 70+


Big
Standing Dunk 85+, Driving Dunk 70+, Vertical 60+, Height at least 6'10


Small
Driving Dunk 86+, Vertical 85+, Height under 6'5






Once you've met these requirements with your MyPlayer build, you can create the dunks using Dunk Style Creator. Once done, you can then assign the package from the Animations screen. 

The post All contact dunk requirements in NBA 2K25 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: All contact dunk requirements in NBA 2K25

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The official ratings reveal for EA FC 25 has begun, and EA Sports has revealed the top 25 names in women's football.


After giving a massive push last year, women's football will continue to be a growing force across all game modes. This year, Barcelona's Aitana Bonmati has risen to the top of the rating chain with an overall rating of 91. She's followed closely by other big stars plying their trades across European football. Without further ado, let's take a look at who has made it to the list of the top 25.


Top 25 women's footballers in EA FC 25


Here's the complete list of all the names of those who have made it to the top 25.



Aitana Bonmati CM 91


Alexia Putellas CM 90


Caroline Graham Hansen RW 90


Sam Kerr ST 90


Sophia Smith ST 89


Ada Hegerberg ST 89


Mapi Leon 89


Marie Antoinette Katoto ST 88


Debinha CAM 88


Kadidiatou Diani RW 88


Patri Guijarro CDM 88


Beth Mead RW 88


Wendie Renard CB 88


Guro Reiten LM 88


Irene Paredes CB 88


Christine Endler GK 88


Alexandra Popp ST 87


Sakina Karchaoui LB 87


Mallory Swanson LM 87


Rose Lavelle 87


Ewa Pajor ST 87


Lauren Hemp LW 86


Khadija Shaw ST 86


Fridolina Rolfo LB 86


Selma Bacha LB 86





The top-25 list includes some fan favorites. Aitana is followed closely by WSL star Sam Kerr and her own Barcelona clubmates Alexia Putellas and Caroline Graham Hansen. All three have an overall rating of 90. Barcelona could be the best club in women's football, as they have more stars on this list.


The top league in French football also has its fair share of representatives, led by Hegerberg and Renard. The duo of Karchaoui and Bacha will be a favorite of those who swear by the meta. In comparison, the WSL has taken a few hits, but Reiten and Mead could be wonderful cards to use in Ultimate Team.


We will review all the cards in detail once EA FC 25 goes live on early access on September 20.

The post EA FC 25 ratings: Top 25 stars from women’s football appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: EA FC 25 ratings: Top 25 stars from women’s football

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Armor of Doom is one of Fortnite's most powerful items, turning you into Doctor Doom himself and unleashing his power onto the land. If you enjoy his Arcane Gauntlets, be prepared to use these and more after embracing Doom's power.


Where to find the Armor of Doom in Fortnite


Armor of Doom is an item exclusive to Fortnite's Isle of Doom, also known as Doom Island. By traveling to the island and interacting with the Cauldron of Power, you'll embrace Doom's power and unlock this armor, giving you all of his abilities and becoming one of the strongest people in your lobby.


Finding Doom Island


Screenshot by Destructoid


Finding Doom Island requires getting a little lucky. In each match, the usual floating Loot Island has a five per cent chance of turning into the Isle of Doom, meaning …
articles.title: How to get the Armor of Doom in Fortnite Chapter 5, Season 4

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
It’s been 25 long years since the release of the Dreamcast (in North America), Sega’s short-lived but beloved little console. That’s about the time that society began to slide downhill. To celebrate this (the console, not the slide), Limited Run Games has some great swag to take you back to the before times.


The big push they’re doing is mostly behind the trading cards, which they say are the “coolest trading cards to grace your eyeballs and touch your fingertips.” Wow, it sounds like I wrote that. Although, I probably would have said “touch your eyeballs” or to give it even more of a vaguely creepy sound. There are 200 cards featuring Dreamcast art that you can smear across your retina. You can buy a hobby box with 20 cards for $24.99 or a booster box with 120 cards for $124.99.


Image via Limited Run Games


I don’t collect cards and never have. Is that normal pricing for trading cards? The booster packs look like VMUs and there are some cool card storage options. Hold on, I can’t get over the price. And then you can pay for sleeves and a box?


The other gear seems a lot more reasonable to me. There’s a skateboard deck for $74.99, a pin, a coin, and a keychain. There’s a hat for $31.99 and a hoodie for $54.99, which seem like fair prices. Everything seems priced right, but the cards give me pause. But, like I said, I know nothing about trading cards. They should have made it a CCG so we could pit Crazy Taxi against Space Channel 5.


Pre-orders are open now, with the shipping date for the items predicted for March 2025. That production time sounds very Limited Run Games. I’m not throwing shade. I like LRG for the most part, but you grow to expect long lead times.

The post Party like its 1999 with Limited Run Games’ Dreamcast gear appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Party like its 1999 with Limited Run Games’ Dreamcast gear

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Motion Picture Association (MPA) has submitted its latest overview of piracy threats to the European Commission. The submission details many of the usual targets, including torrent sites, streaming portals, and piracy apps. The main theme, however, concerns the role of third-party intermediaries. According to the MPA, these companies should take more responsibility, whether they like it or not.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Hollywood and Netflix Report Piracy Threats to the EU, Call for ‘Intermediary’ Action

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Swedish anti-piracy group Rights Alliance has just announced the prosecution of a man allegedly behind pirate IPTV service 'Ghost Farmer TV'. The case is one of several initiated in Sweden in recent years but, for rightsholders, a few prosecutions simply isn't enough. Sweden's Justice Minister considers calls from anti-piracy groups to start going after subscribers premature. That said, the government isn't ruling it out.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate IPTV Arrests in Sweden Should Include Users, Rightsholders Tell Govt.

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Borderlands' tops the chart, followed by 'Trap'. 'Inside Out 2' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 09/09/2024

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A study published this week by researchers in Spain shows how the intent to subscribe to a streaming platform is affected when potential subscribers are presented with stimuli such as advertising-based discounts, loyalty-based discounts, and prosocial anti-piracy messages. When direct threats enter the equation, does the fear factor help or hinder the intent to subscribe?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Threatening Anti-Piracy Messaging Fails to Stimulate Intent to Subscribe

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Sports piracy has been on the rise and pay-per-view events, in particular, are widely accessed through illegal channels. Turki Alalshikh, an advisor at the Royal Court in Saudi Arabia, made a suggestion this week to drastically reduce PPV pricing to cut piracy. American boxer Chris Algieri has an even more drastic idea: "Make it free," he says. UFC CEO Dana White, meanwhile, sees more mileage in prosecuting pirates. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Make Pay-Per-View Access to Boxing Events Free to Fight Piracy’

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
KimCartoon, a pirate site dedicated to all things cartoon, surprised users this week with a sudden "That's All Folks" before shutting itself down. With an estimated 120 million visits over the last 12 months alone, KimCartoon was a very busy site and with that kind of traffic, life can get complicated. The site's operator says the site was shut down "due to DMCA" but, after weathering many storms over the years, maybe there's a little bit more to it than that.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: That’s All Folks: KimCartoon’s 120m Visit Piracy Caper Ends in a DMCA Disaster

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Danish police have arrested a 39-year-old man who shared nude scenes of more than a hundred female actors through Reddit and porn sites. The suspect has been charged with copyright infringement. While posting small clips from movies or TV-shows typically doesn't result in criminal action, taking nude clips out of context is considered a breach of actors' and filmmakers' integrity.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Man Arrested for Sharing Copyright Infringing Nude Scenes Through Reddit

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Second Circuit Court of Appeals has dealt a blow to the Internet Archive's digital book lending program. The court upheld a lower court's decision, stating that IA's practice of scanning and lending copyrighted books without permission is not fair use. IA's lending program directly threatens the revenues of publishers and violates copyright law, the judges ruled.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Internet Archive Loses Landmark E-Book Lending Copyright Appeal Against Publishers

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Major sports rightsholders and broadcasters in Canada have selected UK-based site-blocking veterans Friend MTS to carry out all pirate IPTV blocking under a Federal Court injunction obtained during the summer. The fact that NHL, NBA, and Premier League streams will be blocked by major Canadian ISPs was widely reported. Yet, with significantly less fanfare, it appears that the UFC and MLB have also entered the blocking arena.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: UFC & MLB Join Pirate IPTV Blocking as Broadcasters Collaborate to Cut Costs

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
This weekend, popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy went 'offline' displaying an image that some interpreted as a farewell message. Today the site returned and uploads at third-party sites resumed simultaneously. This is the second time in a few weeks that the site has gone through this mysterious cycle. The main question that remains: Why?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy is Back Online & Uploads Resume

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After obtaining an injunction and an invasive search and seizure order at Canada's Federal Court, teams from Bell, Rogers, Disney, Paramount, Columbia, and Warner Bros. targeted the alleged operators of IPTV service SmoothStreams at their homes in Canada. The defendants were charged with contempt of court when they failed to comply with the terms of the order. Two years later, the defendants are paying a heavy price and the main case hasn't even started.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Bell, Rogers & MPA’s Pirate IPTV Lawsuit is a Slow-Motion Money Pit Nightmare

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Nhentai, a popular adult site with dozens of millions of monthly visits, has been sued for copyright infringement. The lawsuit was filed by California company PCR Distributing, which operates several hentai brands. The complaint alleges that nhentai doesn't respond to takedown notices. The site attempted to settle the dispute confidentially months ago, but that attempt failed. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Pirate’ Site nHentai Sued in U.S. Court for Copyright Infringement

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A co-founder of a group, formed to raise awareness of "damaging" religious instruction received by schoolchildren in the U.S., now has support from the Electronic Frontier Foundation. After Zachary Parrish published the LifeWise Academy's children's curriculum on the website of 'Parents Against LifeWise' he was sued for copyright infringement. In support of a motion to dismiss, EFF says that copyright law isn't a tool to silence critics and a fair use defense will prevail.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: EFF Assists Critic’s Fair Use Defense Over Kids’ Religious Program ‘Leak’

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Cheat seller AimJunkies has suffered two new setbacks in its legal battle with 'Destiny 2' developer Bungie. The Seattle District Court refused to overturn a jury verdict issued in May and will not grant a new trial. Separately, the Court of Appeals affirmed a $4.3 million arbitration award, concluding that no clear errors were made and that the scale of the award is not “completely irrational”
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Court Denies Cheat Seller AimJunkies a New Trial, Affirms Bungie’s $4.3m Win

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
The spectacular demise of Fmovies, Aniwave, and a dozen or more related big-brand pirate sites, has former users asking the same question: Are they really gone forever? With many resurrections and Dr. Who-like regenerations over recent years, some seem optimistic. Government records suggests that business bridges are being built from Hollywood to Vietnam, and back again. It seems unlikely that the resurrection of pirate sites would help in any way.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Fmovies & Aniwave: Will The Masters of Pirate Resurrection Rise Again?

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy once again confuses users with a mysterious message. Instead of the usual list of downloads, it simply shows an image from the film Logan and the brief message "TG Forever". This is similar to a notice that appeared on the site a few weeks ago, after which it eventually resumed business as usual. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy Spooks Users with More ‘Downtime’

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Earlier this month, U.S. law enforcement seized several domain names belonging to popular sports streaming site Streameast. However, instead of shutting down operations, the site is fighting back. After launching new backup domains, the site's operators inform TorrentFreak that they plan to challenge the seizure warrant in court.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Sports Streaming Site Streameast Plans to Appeal U.S. Domain Name Seizures

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Despite malware having an even worse reputation than piracy, until now police operations to take sites down, explicitly because they're involved in both, have been pretty much non-existent. This week, music industry group IFPI revealed Operation Redirect, "the first operation of its kind in Brazil to target illegal sites associated with malware distribution." Intrigued by the announcement, we took a closer look and found plenty of drama.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Operation Redirect: Police Anti-Malware Action Protects Music & Pirates

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Fmovies, one of the most popular pirate streaming sites of recent times, disappeared a few weeks ago. No credit was taken by authorities or rightsholders, not even when related giants including AniWave fell this week. Today, initial suspicions are confirmed; anti-piracy group ACE says it assisted Vietnamese authorities to shut down the piracy ring. In parallel, the Vietnamese Government is organizing a promo tour in Hollywood.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Fmovies Piracy Ring Was Shut Down by Vietnam, Assisted By ACE
